titleStmt.title: A proclamation anent burying in Scots linen
Proclamations. 1688-08-15
titleStmt.author: Council of Trade (Scotland)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at Edinburgh, the fifteen day of August, one thousand six hundred eighty eight years, and of our reign the fourth year.
Steele notation: Arms 235 Faith, Scots and.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
